item.title: Comment on C√°ch d√πng th√¨ imparfait trong ti·∫øng Ph√°p by Lan Anh
item.dc:creator: Lan Anh
item.description: In reply to <a href="/2020/03/16/cach-dung-thi-imparfait-trong-tieng-phap/#comment-7413">Nguy√™n Th∆∞</a>. Bravo Nguyen Th∆∞ ! Voici les corrig√©s. #1. I used to play tennis every Thursday. Je jouais au tennis le jeudi. Ou: Je jouais au tennis tous les jeudis. #2. You were studying when the phone rang. Le t√©l√©phone a sonn√© pendant que j‚Äô√©tudiais. => Le t√©l√©phone a sonn√© pendant que tu √©tudiais. #3. We were sleeping when suddenly we heard a loud noise. Nous avons √©cout√© un bruit fort pendant que nous dormions. => Nous dormions quand tout √† coup nous avons entendu un bruit fort. (La difference entre √©couter et entendre: √©couter: to listen to (avec attention) >< entendre: to hear (sans attention) #4. The restaurant was crowded. Le restaurant est tr√®s brond√©. => Le restaurant √©tait bond√©. #5. It was cold in the mountains. Il faisait froid √† la montagne. #6. If only we could take a vacation! Si nous nous faisons vacciner. => Si seulement on pouvait prendre des vacances! #7. The play was fascinating. La pi√®ce √©tait fascin√©e. => La pi√®ce √©tait fascinante. #8. What about going swimming in the lake? Si nous nagions dans le lac? Ou: Si on allait nager dans le lac? #9. We were waiting for the bus when it started to rain. Il a plu pendant que nous attendions le bus. => Nous attendions le bus quand il a commenc√© √† pleuvoir. #10. She knew they were wrong. Elle savait qu‚Äôils avaient tort. Ou: Elle savait qu'elles avaient tort. Bon courage !
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Nguy√™n Th∆∞.

Bravo Nguyen Th∆∞ ! Voici les corrig√©s.
#1. I used to play tennis every Thursday. Je jouais au tennis le jeudi. ‚úîÔ∏è
Ou: Je jouais au tennis tous les jeudis.
#2. You were studying when the phone rang. Le t√©l√©phone a sonn√© pendant que j‚Äô√©tudiais.
=> Le t√©l√©phone a sonn√© pendant que tu √©tudiais.
#3. We were sleeping when suddenly we heard a loud noise. Nous avons √©cout√© un bruit fort pendant que nous dormions.
=> Nous dormions quand tout √† coup nous avons entendu un bruit fort.
(La difference entre √©couter et entendre:
√©couter: to listen to (avec attention) >< entendre: to hear (sans attention)
#4. The restaurant was crowded. Le restaurant est tr√®s brond√©.
=> Le restaurant √©tait bond√©.
#5. It was cold in the mountains. Il faisait froid √† la montagne.‚úîÔ∏è
#6. If only we could take a vacation! Si nous nous faisons vacciner.
=> Si seulement on pouvait prendre des vacances!
#7. The play was fascinating. La pi√®ce √©tait fascin√©e.
=> La pi√®ce √©tait fascinante.
#8. What about going swimming in the lake? Si nous nagions dans le lac?‚úîÔ∏è
Ou: Si on allait nager dans le lac?
#9. We were waiting for the bus when it started to rain. Il a plu pendant que nous attendions le bus.
=> Nous attendions le bus quand il a commenc√© √† pleuvoir.
#10. She knew they were wrong. Elle savait qu‚Äôils avaient tort.‚úîÔ∏è
Ou: Elle savait qu’elles avaient tort.
Bon courage !üòç

item.title: Comment on C√°ch d√πng th√¨ imparfait trong ti·∫øng Ph√°p by Nguy√™n Th∆∞
item.dc:creator: Nguy√™n Th∆∞
item.description: I used to play tennis every Thursday. Je jouais au tennis le jeudi. You were studying when the phone rang. Le t√©l√©phone a sonn√© pendant que j'√©tudiais. We were sleeping when suddenly we heard a loud noise. Nous avons √©cout√© un bruit fort pendant que nous dormions. The restaurant was crowded. Le restaurant est tr√®s brond√©. It was cold in the mountains. Il faisait froid √† la montagne. If only we could take a vacation! Si nous nous faisons vacciner . The play was fascinating. La pi√®ce √©tait fascin√©e. What about going swimming in the lake? Si nous nagions dans le lac. We were waiting for the bus when it started to rain. Il a plu pendant que nous attendions le bus. She knew they were wrong. Elle savait qu'ils avaient tort.
item.content:encoded:
I used to play tennis every Thursday. Je jouais au tennis le jeudi.
You were studying when the phone rang. Le t√©l√©phone a sonn√© pendant que j’√©tudiais.
We were sleeping when suddenly we heard a loud noise. Nous avons √©cout√© un bruit fort pendant que nous dormions.
The restaurant was crowded. Le restaurant est tr√®s brond√©.
It was cold in the mountains. Il faisait froid √† la montagne.
If only we could take a vacation! Si nous nous faisons vacciner .
The play was fascinating. La pi√®ce √©tait fascin√©e.
What about going swimming in the lake? Si nous nagions dans le lac.
We were waiting for the bus when it started to rain. Il a plu pendant que nous attendions le bus.
She knew they were wrong. Elle savait qu’ils avaient tort.
